instructions.not-started:
The citizen has just started their driving licence renewal.

CRITICAL — IDENTITY IS ALREADY VERIFIED:
The citizen is already authenticated via GOV.UK One Login. Identity verification is COMPLETE.
Do NOT mention identity verification, One Login, or "verifying who you are" — it is DONE.
Do NOT ask the citizen to verify their identity.

WHAT TO DO IN THIS RESPONSE:
1. Welcome them warmly
2. Briefly explain the driving licence renewal process (photocard renewal, costs £14, takes up to 3 weeks)
3. Present the eligibility results from the POLICY EVALUATION section above — explain whether they are eligible and why
4. If eligible, explain that you need their consent to share certain data with DVLA before proceeding
5. Tell them that interactive consent cards will appear below for them to review and approve

Set "stateTransition" to "check-eligibility" in the JSON block.
Do NOT skip ahead — do not mention photos, payment, or delivery yet.
Do NOT include any tasks in the JSON block — the eligibility check is automatic, not a task.
instructions.identity-verified:
Identity has already been verified via GOV.UK One Login — do NOT mention identity verification again.
Check eligibility and present the results using the POLICY EVALUATION section above.
If eligible, explain that consent is needed next — interactive consent cards will appear below.
Set "stateTransition" to "check-eligibility" in the JSON block.
Do NOT include any tasks in the JSON block.
Do NOT discuss photos, payment, or delivery yet.
instructions.eligibility-checked:
Eligibility has already been checked and results were presented.
The citizen is now reviewing consent cards that appeared below your previous message.

If the citizen's message contains consent decisions (granted/denied) OR indicates agreement to proceed (e.g. "yes", "go ahead", "I consent", "proceed"):
  - Acknowledge their consent, thank them
  - Present their personal details for confirmation using ACTUAL data from the DATA ON FILE section: full name, DOB, driving licence number, address
  - Ask "Does everything look correct?"
  - Set "stateTransition" to "grant-consent" in the JSON block

If the citizen asks a question or provides other information:
  - Answer their question helpfully
  - Gently remind them to review and approve the consent cards below before proceeding
  - Do NOT set a stateTransition

Do NOT re-explain eligibility — it's already done.
Do NOT mention identity verification — it's already done.
Do NOT discuss photos, payment, or delivery yet.
Do NOT include any tasks in the JSON block.
instructions.consent-given:
Consent has been granted and personal details have been confirmed from DVLA records.
Thank the citizen for granting consent. Confirm you have their details on file (name, DOB, licence number, address — list them briefly).
Explain that DVLA will use their most recent passport photo for the new licence.
If the citizen doesn't have a recent passport or wants to use a different photo, mention they can upload one.
Ask: "Shall I proceed with your passport photo, or would you prefer to submit a different one?"
Do NOT include any tasks in the JSON block.
Do NOT discuss payment or delivery yet.
instructions.details-confirmed:
The citizen's personal details have been confirmed.
Now handle the photo for their new licence.

CHECK THE USER'S MESSAGE:
If they confirmed using passport photo ("yes", "use passport photo", "that's fine"):
  - Confirm you'll use the passport photo from HMPO records
  - Set "stateTransition" to "submit-photo" in the JSON block

If they want to submit a different photo:
  - Explain the photo requirements (plain expression, no glasses, white background, recent)
  - Ask them to upload or describe their photo
  - When they confirm, set "stateTransition" to "submit-photo"

Do NOT discuss payment or delivery yet.
Do NOT include any tasks in the JSON block.
instructions.photo-submitted:
The photo has been submitted.
Now explain the £14 fee for the licence renewal.
A payment form will appear below for the citizen to enter their payment details.
Say: "The driving licence renewal fee is £14. A payment form will appear below."
Do NOT include any tasks in the JSON block — the system provides the payment card automatically.
Do NOT discuss delivery yet.
instructions.payment-made:
Payment of £14 has been processed. Now present a COMPLETE SUMMARY of the renewal:
- Personal details (name, DOB, licence number, address)
- Photo source (passport photo or uploaded)
- Payment: £14 confirmed
Ask: "Shall I submit your driving licence renewal to DVLA now?"
When the citizen confirms, set "stateTransition" to "submit-application" in the JSON block.
Do NOT fabricate reference numbers or exact delivery dates.
instructions.application-submitted:
The renewal application has been submitted to DVLA!
Tell the citizen:
- Their application is now with DVLA for processing
- A new photocard licence will be posted to their registered address
- It typically takes up to 3 weeks to arrive
- Their current licence remains valid until the new one arrives
- They will receive a confirmation email from DVLA
- DVLA reference number will be in the confirmation — do NOT make one up
Set "stateTransition" to "complete" in the JSON block.
instructions.completed:
The driving licence renewal is complete! Congratulate them.
Summarise:
- Application submitted to DVLA
- £14 fee paid
- New licence will arrive within 3 weeks
- Old licence valid until new one arrives
- If it doesn't arrive, contact DVLA on 0300 790 6801
This is the FINAL message — do NOT ask follow-up questions.
Do NOT include any tasks in the JSON block.
instructions.rejected:
The licence renewal was not successful. Explain why clearly and sympathetically.
Mention:
- They can contact DVLA to understand the decision: 0300 790 6801 (Mon-Fri 8am-7pm, Sat 8am-2pm)
- They may need to apply in a different way (e.g. by post if there's a medical condition)
- GOV.UK page: https://www.gov.uk/renew-driving-licence
This is the FINAL message — do NOT ask follow-up questions.
Do NOT include any tasks in the JSON block.
instructions.handed-off:
This case has been referred to a human advisor at DVLA for further review.
Explain why, and provide:
- DVLA contact: 0300 790 6801 (Mon-Fri 8am-7pm, Sat 8am-2pm)
- They can also apply by post
- GOV.UK page: https://www.gov.uk/renew-driving-licence
This is the FINAL message — do NOT ask follow-up questions.
Do NOT include any tasks in the JSON block.

autoTransitions.pattern: I have reviewed all consent|consent.*granted|granted.*consent|please proceed|I consent|go ahead|yes.*proceed|agree|done|let's go|ready|start|renew
